Author: ProfessorValko
Content: <@436621585882021891> The version from the Microsoft Store must be purchased separately. If you purchased Java Edition (your Mojang Account) before October 2018_ you might have a free code you can use to get it for free. <https://help.mojang.com/customer/en/portal/articles/2064007-minecraft-for-windows-10 >NLNLOnce you download it_ sign in to the Xbox App on Windows 10 and then the game will sign into your XBL account automatically.
